snippet: Saginaw won his fifth straight race with a one-and-three-quarter-length victory in the $100,000 John Morrissey Purse. The race was his 21st career win.
abstract: Saginaw wins his fifth straight race with a one-and-three-quarter-length victory in the $100,000 John Morrissey Purse.
lead_paragraph: Saginaw won his fifth straight race with a one-and-three-quarter-length victory in the $100,000 John Morrissey Purse. The race was his 21st career win.

headline.main: Saginaw Wins Again, at Saratoga Race Course
